title: Blackfrost Ashe Concept Sketch
body:
https://41.media.tumblr.com/9ae523c9a04d7a99f8de3aa75f0272fc/tumblr_o0wm4sa14c1qk32lpo1_1280.png
> 
>  "The Freljord will bow to me, else it shall shatter beneath my heel.”
> 
>  The noble and benevolent Queen Ashe once guided the people of the Freljord with a firm yet gentle hand. The course of history was forever changed, however, when her once warm and passionate heart was corrupted by the icy touch of the Frozen Watchers. Now her armies sweep across the tundra like the blizzard wind, seeking to swell the forces of her Iceborn horde that all of Runeterra might someday feel the Watchers’ wrath.

Hey everyone! Took some time yesterday to throw together a quick Blackfrost Ashe concept! Inspired by a dream I had the other night where I was playing Support Liss to a Blackfrost Ashe in an all Freljord team while Ice seeped out of our Nexus and slowly froze the entire map! This one came together pretty quickly so I didn't come up with many design variations but I'd like to revisit it and polish it up a bit sometime soon. Let me know what you guys think!

EDIT: Tattered the cape up because some of you guys said it was too reminiscent of Talon! I was trying to create a thematic tie with the fabric trailing behind Blackfrost Anivia but I can definitely see why it reminded you guys of Talon.

https://41.media.tumblr.com/1f8246aaebf08d1a4cd3124a9fe17536/tumblr_inline_o0xqxgD3gg1qiaw9q_540.png

If you'd like to see more of my work you can [follow me on twitter!](http://www.twitter.com/TomRandby) I post a lot of concepts and progress images there!

replies.body: O___O Her particles could be so awesome. AHHH HER ULT. \*-*

To be honest, every sister should have a certain set of abilities, which only Lissandra possesses while the others have tools which allows them to utilize their ancestral power but can't be transferred to anyone else from a skin perspective.
they aren't sisters

What if...THEY ARE!?!!? 

BA BA BAAAAA!!!

Jokes aside, only Sej and Ashe have the *slightest* possibility to be related. Liss is like hundreds of years old right?

Actually, Lissandra, Avarosa (Ashe's ancestor), and Syrelda (Sejuani's ancestor) WERE sisters. 

So that makes Lissandra Ashe and Sejuani's great (times like 20)-aunt.
Lissandra is the Iceborn that started the war in the first place. She is over a hundred years old.
I meant Ashe and Sejuani, who propably are.

I would love a blackfrost Sej and Blackfrost Ashe skins, with a similar "purified" lissandra skins.

But i personally love opposite skins.
Well, Lore-wise i hope Ashe wins ofcourse.

Yes! And the possibility for a different and awesome pose when firing off the ult is over 8000! (for the ones who prefer the wrong translation: 9000!)

BTW: could you please take a look at my Frozen Shen edit. I was too late with Alistar edit and have strived to be early this time, but it needs to be seen by a Rioter for something to happen at all:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/B7uZa5RX-frozen-shen-needs-more-contrast-no-more-monochrome-like-the-old-model-also-was

Thanks! :)

You're thinking of this all wrong. It's not about how cool she would look, Riot needs to do this to show they care about people.

If Riot has any compassion for their players, they need to promote awareness for **Black Ice** as a dangerous road hazard. FOR THE SAKE OF YOUNG TEEN DRIVERS EVERYWHERE MAKE THIS SKIN!!

Want my ponytail Ashe now !

Do eeeeeeeeet :3

You know you want to o.o
Looks fantastic, The one problem I foresee is making it look significantly different from Marauder, which would be difficult.

> [{quoted}](name=JohnTheLibrarian,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=RWR5G4Yq,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-01-13T18:57:26.952+0000)
>
> Looks fantastic, The one problem I foresee is making it look significantly different from Marauder, which would be difficult.

Also looks a LOT like Drow Ranger from WC3/Dota/2

https://41.media.tumblr.com/97700e710792661361055f2d5b1c6874/tumblr_inline_o0ygpfXmcx1qiaw9q_540.png 

It's a hard similarity to get away from lol
I wouldn't worry as much about similarities to other games. Odds are either they'd like the similarity, or they wouldn't know the other game.

It looks really good but i don't think it's distinct enough from marauder. In game it would look very similar in style.

(honestly like this better than marauder, but it just doesn't feel special enough since we have marauder)

Thanks!  Similarity to marauder was definitely a concern I had when making it. I think revisiting the bow and making it more dark ice and less stone detailing might help to differentiate them. If this was a legendary tier skin like Blackfrost Anivia it'd had new, dark VO, new animations and new particles so that'd help to set them apart, but as a 750-975 tier skin it is a similar theme. Hopefully sometime soon I'll have time to sit down and spend more time making some variations!
this would be a really cool skin :D, great work!{{summoner:4}}
Ashe x Lissandra = This
Love the new cape, and you got a Red! Great job!
Heres my money riot

UGH THIS WOULD BE GORGE!!! :D The voicelines, the animations, the particles <3

Fantastic concept/design btw :D
yaaAAAASSSSSS. Ashe is the only Freljord lady without a skin of this type and you did a great job with this concept.

The colors reminds me of Sylvanas Windrunner I like it !!
Good looking skin concept, plus I think that would be such a cool game mode :3
Considering how it could have some lore to it, I'd like this. This could be Ashe corrupted by Lissandra and turned iceborn
I like! Thank you for making my dream come true!

i think the colors are a little reminiscent of amethyst ashe but without the gold undertones

but otherwise gorgeous as always :D

(that nexus ice thing sounds soooo cool)

Oh yes! They should TOTALLY have another Freljord event, where Lissandra's Frostguard totally whoops the opposition and turns Ashe & Sejuani into Blackfrost. A defeated ragtag gang of Avarosas and Frost Claws then have to find a way to save their leaders from the Ice Witch!
one name...... sylvannas xD

They should make a black frost skin for her, and lissandra, and also maybe Sej, and if they were all legendary it would be a really nice skin line, that are also all linked by lore.
